entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Expose `Rune.MaxUtf16CharsPerRune` and `Rune.MaxUtf8BytesPerRune` #91510
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Deconstruct` method to `Rune` #91509
  • [API Proposal]: Add explicit conversion operator from `Rune` to `char` #91508
  • Inconsistent debug views of dictionaries #91506
  • Assertion failed '!"Missing flags on tree"' #91505
  • [API Proposal]: Auto generate JsonSerializerContext using metadata collection mode by default. #91495

Closed

  • Assertion failed '(reinterpret_cast<size_t>(addr) & (byteSize - 1)) == 0' during 'Emit code' #91335
    8.0.0
  • NetBSD: Recursion in CLRException::GetThrowable #5701
    Future
  • Launching a dotnet process with real time causes all the runtime threads to have same priority #77108
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement Linq CountBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #91507
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update the assert to include Vector64/Vector128 CreateScalar #91504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the VN for xor operation #91503
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to Meter and Instruments #91496
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Update MemoryCacheExtensions.cs #91494
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • invalid assert for segments #91491
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix usage of load library #91490
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [c11] define mono atomics in terms of standard atomics #91489
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove unused CLR_E_BIND_* errors #91488
    area-VM-coreclr
  • DNMD in Mono #91487
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • Fix impNonConstFallback #91345
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup only changes #91445
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix usage of load library #91483
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2258306 #91485
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Support unloadability in `Microsoft.CSharp`. #89536
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, community-contribution
  • Expand CreateSpan in T0 #91403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #89673
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy to ListDictionaryInternal #91355
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] remove special StringContent handling #91463
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Enable interceptors implicitly in binder gen nupkg when generator is enabled #91469
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Condition EnableSingleFileAnalyzer #91474
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0] Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense package version #91481
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • Adding a naive implementation of various primitive tensor operations #91228
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch the `AppWithSubDirs` project used for single-file tests to project that is built outside of test runs #91477
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #91373
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Move TargetsCurrent to net9 and add net8 workload #91480
    area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove RunApiCompat switch from APICompat and PackageValidation #35118
  • `dotnet run --help` does not show `--environment` switch #35108

Closed

  • `dotnet build --help` results in project evaluation and msbuild SDK resolution #27374

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add DOTNET_LAUNCH_PROFILE environment when invoking dotnet run #35029
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Move to granular opt-in for interceptors preview #35024
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2258401 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC fails in method containing await foreach #69805

Closed

  • Usings do not collapse in C# #69685
  • Error List does not present the correct URI for the displayed diagnostic ID from a Roslyn analyzer's helpLinkUri #68816
    17.8 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize `T ?? null` to `T` where `T` is a reference type #69803
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Cache the delegate from non-capturing local functions #69801
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during ToDisplayString #69800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Trim ToString calls when converting to interpolated strings when there are interpolated string handlers available. #69723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Properly parse members in type declarations missing an identifier #69798
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Slightly fewer allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #69791
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BLAZOR: Increase Debouce Time For Render #50494
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50493
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50492
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #50491
  • Allow additional Tags for activity creation #50488
  • RequestQuery won't be logged if it's the only logging field selected #50487

Closed

  • How to persist data on Blazor SSR + WASM Client in .NET 8 preview 6 #49448
    8.0-rc1
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50435
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50436
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50449
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #50470
  • Faild to load {Assembly}.styles.css with a specific route in .net 8 Blazor Web App #50471

PullRequests

Created

  • Update selenium #50486
    area-blazor

Updated

  • Styling Update for Header and Footer Elements #50130
    community-contribution, feature-templates, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2258703 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Update CertificateLoader.cs #50474
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • WIP: Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50422
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [SignalR] Error if multiple service attributes are on a single parameter #50248
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc2
  • Rename internal UseAck to UseStatefulReconnect #50407
    area-signalr
  • Document the coupling between KestrelServerLimits and *TransportOptions #50468
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor android wont go after splash page at release version (.NET 8 preview 7) #17184
  • HTTP files do not appear to work in MAUI #17183
  • Looks ugly as shit #17182
  • Unable to hide title bar fron window with blazor hybrid on Windows #17181
  • Concise XAML by remove ending tag name #17180
  • Not Able to find .Net Multi-Platform Apps UI #17179
  • Emulator crashing when using C# markup for hot reload #17178

Closed

  • Mouse scroll on 'X' closes application #16179
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17177
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    .NET 8 GA

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected ForeignKey despite being explicitly ignored in Convention-Based Model Configuration #31615
  • Problem while saving Byte array in mysql database with entity framework core #31614
  • Ability to use application logging subsystem #31613
  • Calling Select.Distinct inside of a Select causes duplicate parent entries if a value is null #31611

Closed

  • Question: json Column: support for readonly dictionaries #31607

PullRequests

Created

  • Increase the retry delay for throttling errors on Azure SQL. #31612

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #31602
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Block has-pending-model-changes when EF < 8 #31605
